channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Forminator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Forminator

item.title: CVE-2023-3134|2024-08-02T06:48:07.875Z -- unknown -- forminator
item.description: The Forminator WordPress plugin before 1.24.4 does not properly escape values that are being reflected inside form fields that use pre-populated query parameters, which could lead to reflected XSS attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-5119|2024-08-02T07:44:53.707Z -- unknown -- forminator
item.description: The Forminator WordPress plugin before 1.27.0 does not properly sanitize the redirect-url field in the form submission settings, which could allow high-privilege users such as an administrator to inject arbitrary web scripts even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in a multisite setup).

item.title: CVE-2023-2010|2024-08-02T06:05:27.089Z -- unknown -- forminator
item.description: The Forminator WordPress plugin before 1.24.1 does not use an atomic operation to check whether a user has already voted, and then update that information. This leads to a Race Condition that may allow a single user to vote multiple times on a poll.
